``verbatim``
============

The ``verbatim`` tag marks sections as being raw text that should not be
parsed. For example to put Twig syntax as example into a template you can use
this snippet:

.. code-block:: html+twig

    {% verbatim %}
        <ul>
        {% for item in seq %}
            <li>{{ item }}</li>
        {% endfor %}
        </ul>
    {% endverbatim %}
